stimulusHtml: Which of the functions f, g, and h have a graph with exactly two points of inflection?

features.html:
f ′ ′ ( x ) = x ( x − 1 ) 2 ( x + 2 ) 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@490D@

g ′ ′ ( x ) = x ( x − 1 ) 2 ( x + 2 ) 3 + 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4AB5@

h ′ ′ (x)=x (x−1) 2 (x+2) 3 −1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4AC1@

The twice-differentiable functions f, g, and h have second derivatives given above.
